dt-api.name: searchBuilder.getDetails()
dt-api.summary: Get the details of the current search setup

type.description: Gets the details of the current search.
type.returns: Object containing the current details of the search

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to get the details of the data structure and search criteria that is being applied to the DataTable.
`-init searchBuilder.getDetails()` takes no argument, the details are returned for the overall search criteria.
